description: The Alpine Meadows Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Alpine Meadows for the snow report
Alexa, ask Alpine Meadows for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Alpine Meadows
shortDescription: The Alpine Meadows Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Alpine Meadows.
